Description:
All about location.
An A1 lifestyle opportunity within walking distance to Porter Avenue Shops and the Highton Village, this is a combination that is hard to beat. Ideal for those seeking a range of services including Bellaire Primary, Belmont High and public transport within close proximity. Consisting of three bedrooms with built in robes, spacious living, kitchen and meals area on a generous fully landscaped allotment including alfresco entertaining, single carport and single lock up garage. Features include air conditioning split system, gas heater, garden shed and north facing sunroom. Ease of day to day living is assured being with easy reach of Waurn Ponds Shopping, the Aquatic Centre, Ring Road, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital. Outstanding value is present for first home buyers or investors alike. Book your private inspection now.
Insights: 11 Cuthbert Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Ultimate Entertainer with Bay Views
All inspections welcome via private viewing. Please contact agent to arrange an inspection.
This premium home demonstrates the very best in low maintenance living and perfectly designed for the entertainer. Impeccable quality throughout, this stunning four-bedroom home with three separate living rooms boasts a huge undercover outdoor area with a built-in kitchen plus a balcony with bay views. Ideal for those who are yearning for more of their weekend time back to entertain and enjoy an active lifestyle.
Features include:
Undercover outdoor area with Merbau deck and outdoor kitchen
Kitchen-80mm Caesarstone waterfall bench 900mm gas cooking
Rumpus room with bay views and access to the balcony
Double Glazed Windows. Northerly aspect thermal efficiency
60mm stone tops to bathroom and ensuite vanity
Ducted vacuum and Central Heating and Cooling
Square-set cornices throughput with high doors
Wide hallway entry and floating timber staircase
The backyard is ideal for a small pool or kids play area
Central heating and cooling

Description:
Two sold, one remaining.
On offer here is the chance to purchase the last of 3 modern townhouses in Corowa Court. This brand-new home provides the lucky purchaser with a Turn Key experience, with nothing left to do except unpack.
This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom residence has been designed around a low-maintenance and hassle-free lifestyle and features a modern finish, with a neutral colour scheme throughout.
The kitchen offers modern appliances including 600mm oven, cook top and dishwasher, and stone bench tops. The open plan, kitchen, living and dining area will capture the morning sun and will be complemented with a private courtyard.
Accommodation includes a sizable master bedroom with a large walk in robe and ensuite, and 2 other bedrooms with built in robes, serviced by a central bathroom.
Features includes:
- Remote oversized single garage with internal access.
- Split system heating and cooling.
Located in a convenient area of Grovedale, this property is within walking distance to public transport, less than a 5 minute drive to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University and the Geelong Ring Road, and only 15 minutes to the Geelong CBD. Enquire today!

Description:
An Irresistible Lifestyle
Offering an impeccable level of craftsmanship and attention to detail. This superior, quality-built family home has unprecedented street appeal. Showcasing tastefully updated interiors, a delightful backyard, and ample secure parking. This stunning two-storey home is sure to impress.
Situated in a quiet court and occupying 909m2 approx. this location will leave you wanting nothing more. Within easy reach of public transport, Ash Road shopping strip, Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School are close by for young families, along with the Leopold Community Hub and Library. The expansive Gateway Plaza leaves you spoilt for choice with shopping and easy access via the Bellarine Highway to the heart of Geelong or exploring the wineries and coastline of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Offering four generous sized bedrooms, all located upstairs and capture stunning views of the bay water, right through to the You Yangs. The generous main bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe providing ample storage, the dressing room with laundry chute leads to the private ensuite. The three additional bedrooms odder built-in robes and share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet. Both bathrooms are in spotless condition, while also granting you the choice to refresh with a modern touch.
With plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy, this spacious home consists of three separate living spaces. Located at the front of the home, the formal lounge & dining is bathed in natural light. The open plan living, meals & kitchen zone is the hub of the home and oversee the backyard from this generous living space!
The kitchen exudes timeless elegance with black and white cabinetry and black fittings. Stylish pendant lights highlight the island bench, which showcases a custom Victorian Ash timber waterfall bench top. Quality appliances include built in oven, 900mm stainless steel gas cook top, dishwasher and range hood.
Completing the floorplan inside is the laundry and powder room, along with the versatile study /5th bedroom.
The interiors seamlessly blend original character with contemporary modernizes. Freshly painted walls, new hybrid waterproof flooring, new lighting, new black ceiling fans, and new blinds throughout. Additional features include ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, solar panels benefiting both the environment and your bank account.
Outdoors features a large alfresco area with built-in umbrella, which is perfect for relaxing on those warm summer days. Surrounded by established cottage gardens and a generous lawn area, the backyard is simply charming. Children will be the envy of all their friends with a playground area with shade sail, which features a sandpit, monkey bars, and swing. The cubby house, rainwater tank, and garden sheds, as well as the remote double lock-up garage leading through to the single carport and large work shed complete the rear yard.
This property will give you the family friendly lifestyle youve been longing for! Dont miss this amazing opportunity!
Insights: 19 Townview Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 19 other 5 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Private & Premium titled allotment
Nestled at the end of a gorgeous cul-de-sac in Torquay's most prestigious estate, Seachange. Surrounded in quality homes and positioned next to a reserve, you are sure to embrace the lifestyle that this large half-acre block offers. The fact that all services are provided makes this enormous piece of heaven, stress free and gives you full use of the space you desire.
Family, friends and a life you can enjoy. 24 Brumby Drive has it all!
Contact a Ferris Gold real estate consultant to find out more.
www.ferrisgold.com.au

Description:
Impeccable investment, holiday or family home.
***Appointments via private inspection only. Please call Mitchell Falzon at any time to schedule a viewing.***
This new build extends the lucky investor, holiday home seeker or family an array of benefits.
The beautiful facade greets you to a four bedroom home, all with built-in robes excluding the large master with a walk-in robe and ensuite. A bright central bathroom services your guests, while the open plan kitchen with stone bench tops and walk in pantry overlooks the dining, living and undercover pergola displaying perfection for entertaining all year round. Additional conveniences are a separate lounge area, well-positioned laundry and double garage.
Along with your bragging rights of having a foothold in one of the most popular beach and surf destinations in the world, you're nearby to schools for all ages, multiple parks and reserves, including state-of-the-art sports facilities. The Esplanade offers Torquay's beaches, cafes, restaurants and shops and you're a short drive to one of our most popular, world renowned tourist destinations, the Great Ocean Road.
Mitchell Falzon is contactable at any time to answer any questions, or schedule an inspection.

Description:
Centrally Located Unit In Main Street Location
The Feel:
This unit is set back on a block of ground floor units, with glorious morning & afternoon sunshine to the 2 outdoor sitting areas. Freshly painted & with new carpets to the living & bedrooms, this neatly presented unit comprises 2 bedrooms with built-in robes, & shared access to a family bathroom. A generous sized kitchen overlooks the meals area & an adjoining living room features a charming bay window. Act now to secure easy living this close to the main street shopping & river trail walks.
The Facts:
-Centrally located to main street shopping and within close proximity to Barwon River
-Ideally positioned for privacy
-Single level brick veneer unit with front veranda & rear fenced courtyard
-Freshly presented unit with new floor coverings, paint & light fixtures
-Comprises 2 bedrooms with built-in robes
-Timber kitchen with ample storage, electric wall oven & cooktop
-Sunny meals area & adjoining living room
-Central bathroom with frameless shower for accessibility, vanity & separate toilet
-Split system AC in living room
-Single lock up garage with direct access to west-facing rear courtyard
-Neat concrete pathways on single level
-Versatile opportunity for those looking to invest or downsize
The Owner Loves.
We rarely use our car, it stays in the garage because we love walking everywhere - to the coffee shop, the supermarket, or along the riverside. There is no better place to come home to relax.

Description:
Perfect Coastal Retreat
The Feel:
This beautiful apartment in the stylish Arinya complex represents a great opportunity to buy into old Barwon Heads, only one block back from Hitchcock Avenue and convenient to everything that makes this seaside village so popular. Neat, beautifully landscaped and light-filled, this north-facing ground floor position is compact and fuss-free, with a designated carport, making it an attractive investment, holiday or break into the market purchase.
The Facts:
-Centrally located to main street shopping & close proximity to Barwon River (less than 5 bike ride!)
-Ideal north-facing position at front of block, w/ private courtyard protected by high brush fence
-Versatile opportunity for those looking to invest, downsize or holiday let
-Comfortable floorplan suited to couples, singles & small families
-Beautifully presented, comprising 2 carpeted bedrooms (master with BIR)
-Practical kitchen with Blanco oven, electric cook top & brand-new Bosch dishwasher
-Corner glazing to the kitchen boasts a stunning outlook over low maintenance coastal garden
-Functional utility space & storage cupboards
-Sunny open plan meals & living room with electric wall heater
-Indoor/outdoor living extends the space for entertaining on the deck
-Beautifully landscaped gardens with raised vegetable garden bed and passionfruit vine
-Shared bathroom with shower, vanity & toilet
-New roller blinds to living room & bedrooms
-Outdoor shower
-Rear covered parking space
-Walk & ride everywhere; head to the Village Parklands, main street shops, river & beaches!
The Owner Loves....
This is the perfect coastal retreat. We love that its light-filled and located in the heart of Barwon Heads, just a couple of blocks from the shops and cafes on Hitchcock Avenue and a short stroll to the beach, river, parks and tennis courts. The living and dining area is north-facing and opens to a sunny deck and courtyard garden the perfect place for relaxing and entertaining.

Description:
Tranquillity on your doorstep!
This wonderfully designed home is a perfect combination of both convenience and luxury. Located on approx. 512m2 offering a spectacular location, overlooking open parkland, while all amenities are just a stone throw away.
This spectacular, single- level residence will exceed all expectations with its outstanding fittings and fixtures throughout. Presenting this immaculate 4-bedroom home, with exquisite attention to detail, no expense has been spared in creating a sense of comfort, whilst ticking all the boxes.
This is a generous and convenient layout for all buyers alike. Offering a large main bedroom with full ensuite, walk in robe and a stunning outlook over the estuary parkland. Comprising two large living areas, stylish and fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop and large island bench/ breakfast bar. Overlooking the dining and living area and flowing out to the paved firepit area, making it a perfect space for outdoor entertaining. A delightful family bathroom services the three additional bedrooms (all with built in robes).
With a clever floor plan, the home is appointed with an abundance of storage options, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large double lock-up garage, as well as convenient side vehicle access and low maintenance gardens.
You'll love the family-friendly location close to parks, sporting grounds, public transport, kindergartens and schools. Only a short 3-minute drive to the Gateway Plaza Shopping Centre and easy access to both the Bellarine Peninsula and Geelong CBD. Don't let this be a property you miss out on!
Insights: 15 Winslow Avenue, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
"Toorang" - Historic Bellarine Peninsula Italianate Homestead
Exceptionally located at the gateway to the Bellarine Peninsula situated 15 minutes Geelong City Centre, 15 minutes Ocean Grove, 20 minutes Queenscliff and 5 minutes to Leopold Plaza shopping. Elevated majestic surrounds delivering a lifestyle of excellence in supremely private tranquillity.
With sealed Melaluka Road frontage, Toorang is introduced via a tree lined driveway leading to the imposing circa 1853 Italianate residence overlooking the iconic Lake Connewarre, an estuary encompassing some 2,200 Acres.Toorang has views to Barwon Heads and Breamlea and is believed to be one of the oldest estates on the Bellarine Peninsula with direct water frontage.
The residence provides formal entry, 3 bedrooms (master ensuite), open plan living, formal sitting room, library and observation tower. In line with country living, a woodfired AGA slow combustion stove, separate gas hotplates and electric oven along with dishwasher complete the main kitchen with delightful water outlook. A separate guest wing which offers living area, kitchen (St.George electric oven) bathroom providing the ideal adjunct to the residence overlooking the salt water IG pool.
Further improvements include double storey self contained coachouse accommodation with 3 bedrooms (all ensuited) kitchen, two multi purpose rooms and a large store room
Externally, Toorang is subdivided into 9 main paddocks (electric fencing) on generally heavy soils with 1 dam. Timber cattle yards (steel crush) all steel hayshed and ancillary shed make this magnificent property an enviable country retreat.
Mains water connected.
A rare offering after 34 years with the same family ownership. A genuine chance for the purchaser to become only the thirteenth owner since 1853.

Description:
Fully Titled - 532m2
This fully titled 532m2 (approx.) lot provides a blank canvas for you to build your dream home.
With a 16m frontage x 33m depth, this allotment will prove perfect for a variety of house designs and no concerns over what your neighbours might build as all three bordering properties are fully developed with single storey homes. Fully serviced with all utilities including fibre optic/NBN ready and recycled water. Located in the hugely popular Zeally Sands Estate you will be close to everything you could possibly need plus more. The Sands championship golf course, Whites Beach, new primary and high schools, sporting precincts and the Dunes Shopping Centre are all within close proximity.
Why live someone elses dream when you can create your own now!

Description:
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS!
This charming, immaculate property is sure to appeal to a broad range of buyers - families wanting access to excellent schools for their children, first home buyers and tradies looking for storage and space for vehicles, trailers etc. or the astute developer.
Belmont is one of Geelong's most popular suburbs and Henry Street is in the middle of the action. Close to Belmont and Waurn Ponds Shopping Centres, quality schools all close by, public transport not far from the front door.
This property features four generous bedrooms and two bathrooms.
Delightful timber kitchen includes plenty of cupboard/bench space and electric cooking. Large formal lounge. Neutral decor throughout, gas heating.
Outside to large rear garden, great for the kids and pets. This area includes near new large single garage/workshop with RAD. Plenty of space to store equipment, the caravan, trailer, boat.
All this on a 728m2 allotment. This allotment could be ideal for future unit/townhouse development STCA.
Due to restrictions imposed as a result of the Corona Virus, this property can only be inspected by private appointment. Please ring John on 0412 745 029 to make your appointment.

Description:
Grovedale gem.
What an opportunity to purchase one of Grovedale's best value properties. Situated on a 618sqm approximate allotment, and located within walking distance to the shops, schools, public transport and a 15 minute drive to Torquay. Comprising three spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe, remaining bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom and a studio/workshop space flowing off the garage, perfect for any handyman/gardener or painter. The kitchen provides ample bench and cupboard space and conveniently over looks one of the living areas and seamlessly flows out onto the undercover alfresco area, perfect for entertaining family BBQ's all year round.
Low maintenance, attractive and private north/westerly backyard lined with fruit trees (apricot, apple, lemon, plum) as well as a south facing undercover patio is great for a family to enjoy! Wonderfully positioned, the home truly offers a magnificent lifestyle close to everything and packed with features like 2.5kw solar panels you will enjoy well into the future. Positioned within minutes to the expansive Waurn Ponds Shopping Complex with all the amenities you may need, also offering Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and access to the Geelong Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in under an hour. Walking distance to quality schooling of all ages in Mandama and Grovedale West Primary, plus Grovedale College. This is an outstanding home in a family friendly location that is absolutely ideal for first home buyers, families and investors alike.

Description:
The lifestyle you're after.
Enlisting an exceptional locale, expansive living, family lifestyle and endless potential, 8 Victory Way is ideal for families, renovators and investors. The close proximity to the Barrabool Hills Plaza and Highton Village provides inviting cafes, retail stores and all your daily amenities. Surrounded by Geelong's prestigious education facilities, the home will provide for families of all ages. With easy access to the Ring Road, Geelong CBD and public transport will make your daily commute seamless.
Situated on a generous 671m2 (approx.) allotment, the home comprises of 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Downstairs is the expansive lounge room, kitchen, dining and guest bedroom with shared access to the bathroom. Upstairs are 4 more spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom offers a walk-through robe and ensuite, the second with a walk-in robe, while the other 2 bedrooms have built-in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom.
The substantial backyard offers an entertaining area, drive through access from the double car garage ample lawn space for kids and pets to play.
Sure to attract an array of buyers, don't miss your opportunity to purchase a piece of Highton's highly sought after real estate.

Description:
Spacious Living, Both Inside and Out!
Set upon approx. 665m2, this property offers spacious family living both inside and out!
The Dorothy Street shops are a short walk from your front door, meaning you dont have to venture far for your daily essentials. The Bellarine Rail Trail is also within easy walking distance, along with public transport and the Cornthwaite Reserve playground. Families are taken great care of with Leopold P.S, Leopold Community Hub, and the Leopold Library just moments away. Easy access to the Gateway Plaza and local sporting grounds adds the final touch to this family-friendly locale.
Its easy to see that this home has been well-loved over the years, with the interiors well kept. The formal lounge and dining room create a wealth of space, while the generous open plan living/dining/kitchen zone provides the lively hub of the home. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with an abundance of storage and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, 900mm electric cooktop, rangehood).
Zoned to the front of the home, the Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom, while the front study is ideal for students and home business owners alike. The laundry with external access and separate toilet complete the generous layout. Youll be in comfort all year long with two gas wall heaters and a split-system air conditioner.
Outside, the alfresco creates a peaceful setting for outdoor living. Leafy trees create a lovely sense of privacy. The backyard gives children plenty of room to run and play, while the gardens are home to a veggie box. The remote single lock-up garage is complete with a workshop.
With the elements in place for great family living, youll need to act swiftly to secure this family abode! Enquire today!

Prime Location with Rear Access
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace easy living in this sought after pocket of Belmont! Whether youre dreaming of owning your own home, looking for a great place to raise a family, or searching for a terrific investment, this home will be at the top of your list! Set on a large block of approx 664m2 with rear access provides convenience and practicality. Offering 3 good sized bedrooms the master with BIR and all serviced by the centrally located bathroom. Large living upon entry with loads of windows allowing plenty of natural light. Heating and cooling is provided via a split system A/C and ceiling fans in all the bedrooms. The kitchen offers ample storage with gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher. Heading outside youll find the undercover entertaining overlooking the spacious yard. Laneway access via double gates and a two car remote garage with workshop or studio space. Located close to public transport, schools and Highton Village Shops, this game changing opportunity is something you simply cant afford to miss.

Description:
Living high on the hill
Impeccable quality shines through at this large family home in one of Hightons premier locations. Built over three levels every luxury and amenity has been incorporated to enhance the comfort, space and the beautiful ambience of the property and its amazing vistas. With four bedrooms plus study or fifth bedroom, four living areas and three bathrooms an abundance of space for even the largest of families is guaranteed. The ground floor boasts a large open plan lounge and dining room with views over Geelong, amazing kitchen with stone bench tops, double oven, integrated dishwasher and butlers pantry, a home theatre room, a formal lounge, study, two bedrooms, central bathroom, powder room and a large covered outdoor entertainment area. On the lower level is the double garage with remote control access and direct internal access, separate workshop, large third bedroom, rumpus room with built in bar and outdoor entertaining area, bathroom, sauna room, powder room and laundry. The top level of the home has the master bedroom boasting incredible views, ensuite and walk in robe. Ideally located to leading primary and secondary schools, shops, sporting facilities and public transport.
For more information on this property text '2 Rivington' to 0428 444 841

Description:
Lot 471 - Stage 13 The Dunes - TITLED
401m2 corner block located on Rosella Road in Stage 13 The Dunes, Torquay.
NBN and utility connections ready - Titled, ready to build now!
Schools, shops & sporting facilities all within arms reach.
5% deposit required at signing of contracts within 7 days of acceptance.
Contracts are ready to sign and deposit is due at confirmation of lot purchase.
*While every effort is made to deliver titles and lots at the expected timeframes, there are several factors out of the control of the developer, civil contractor and agent that can cause the release of land to sometimes be delayed or earlier than quoted. We will endeavor to keep buyers updated during construction of expected timeframes for titles and settlement. We suggest that buyers take this into account when purchasing.

Description:
Impressive Family Living
Here is a home that has it all. Superbly renovated, it has everything for the modern family. Enormous shared living space, multi-functional outdoor entertaining zones, beautifully updated kitchen and bathrooms and an abundance of space throughout the property.
Comprised of;
Three large bedrooms ALL with walk in robes and ceiling fans, the master bedroom also
features a beautifully appointed ensuite
Completely renovated kitchen with breakfast bar, this area also contains the main family
living room and formal dining space
Large undercover BBQ and entertaining area, the north-facing backyard also has a fire-
pit zone, cubby house and large landscaped lawn and gardens
Double garage and further off-street driveway parking
A beautifully designed second living area providing room for quiet time or socialising
Located walking distance to Leopold Primary School, Gateway Sanctuary Nature Playground, restaurants, cafes and local shopping its also less than 20 minutes to Queenscliff, Thirteenth Beach and Central Geelong. A true lifestyle location and a magnificent family home.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections strictly on a 'one on one' basis and by using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.
Insights: 10 Hannan Crescent, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2020 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Under offer
This stunning Barrabool sandstone and weatherboard residence (circa 1861) provides a rare opportunity with over 150 years of history, character and individuality to create your own piece of history by further renovating and adding your stamp to this unique residence. Originally built by pioneer Swiss vignerons, this property has historical significance for its associations with the winemaking industry in colonial Victoria, and the breathtaking cellar transports us back in time. Neuchatel covers approximately two acres and is located in the prestigious rolling hills of Barrabool, just a stones throw from the Ceres township where peace and tranquillity is the way of life.
While a new extension would enhance the size, this gorgeous cottage currently comprises three bedrooms with original features. Master bedroom with a deep-set colonial window creates a very special ambience and charm, two childrens bedrooms, a functional family bathroom, a simple and light-filled kitchen that looks out to the yard, separate sitting room and a large north-facing dining and lounge with polished floorboards and fireplaces. French doors open to a verandah and alfresco deck thats ideal for outdoor living and entertaining. A stunning and unique feature of this residence is the 3x6 metre sandstone basement cellar.
Surrounded by a manicured hedged garden and century-old trees, outdoor features include an original coach house and stables, minor sheds, vegetable gardens, childrens play area, original Chasselas grapevine and 50,000 litres of water storage.
With a bus stop to private schools directly outside the property, easy access to Highton Village shops and cafes, Geelong CBD and the Surf Coast, and one hour to Melbourne CBD via the Ring Road, Neuchatel is ideally located to maximise all the benefits of country living, while being close to amenities.
Move in today and soak up the history, or put your own special mark on the property with opportunities to renovate and extend.
For more information on this property text '460 Merrawarp' to 0428 444 841
